full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Title

**National Capital Region Temporary Help Services**

#### Reference Number

CB-883-4350916

#### Amendment Number

1

#### Solicitation Number

S4567985

#### Publication Date

February 26, 2024

#### Tender Closing Date

March 1, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST

#### Tender Status

**Expired**

#### Synopsis

The Department of National Defense (DND) is soliciting Temporary Help Services from qualified contractors via a Request for Proposal (RFP) issued under Supply Arrangement (SA) EN578-172870. This requirement is open only to SA holders who qualify under Stream 5.1: Computer Application Support.

#### Requirements

The requirements include:

* Temporary Help Services for the Department of National Defense (DND)
* Resource(s) minimum security level: Secret
* Level of effort: As required by DND

#### Evaluation Criteria

The proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Notice Documents

The tender documents can be accessed at:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32783/s4567985-rfp.pdf

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gd'aidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (613) 971-7955

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to participants who qualify under the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Regions of Opportunity

The region of opportunity is the National Capital Region (NCR).
The region of delivery is the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Contracting Entity Name

Department of National Defense
Address: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K2H8G1
Country: Canada

#### Contact Info

Contact: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
(613) 971-7955
